statements: DELETE FROM customer_sales WHERE customer_id = 123 AND product_category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM customer_sales WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND purchase_amount > 1000;

DELETE FROM customer_purchase_history
WHERE customer_id = 123 AND purchase_amount < 1000

DELETE FROM sales_prediction
WHERE prediction_date > '2022-01-01' AND customer_id = 456
DELETE FROM Product WHERE product_id = 100 AND price > 50.00;
DELETE FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_id = 500 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM sales WHERE revenue > 1000);
